text: The flag of Kyrgyzstan was created in 1992. The flag has a red background with a yellow sun that consists of 40 flames to represent the 40 tribes. The X shape in the middle is a Yurt. == Appearance == It has a red field charged with a yellow sun with forty uniformly spaced rays; the sun is crossed by two sets of three lines. Kyrgyzstan Category:National symbols of Kyrgyzstan Category:Flags introduced in 2023
title: Flag of Kyrgyzstan
